# Introduction


# Packages and libraries {.unnumbered .unnumbered}

It is good practice to include a list of packages used

# Plots  {.tabset}
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(patchwork)
gg0 <- list()

p1 <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(mpg, hp)) + geom_point()
p2 <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(mpg, disp)) + geom_point()
p3 <- ggplot(mtcars, aes(mpg, drat)) + geom_point()

gg0[[1]] <- p1/p1/p1/p1
gg0[[2]] <- p1/p1/p1/p1/p1/p1
gg0[[3]] <- p1/p1/p1/p1/p1/p1/p1/p1/p1

headings <- c('hp','disp','drat')
```

#### Heading

::: {.panel-tabset}
```{r, results='asis', echo = FALSE}
for (i in 1:length(gg0)) {
  cat("##### ",headings[i],"\n")
  print(gg0[[i]])
  cat('\n\n')
}
```

:::
